message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 60% and you get 40%
I appreciate the offer, Alice. I'll take 60% this time, you can have 40%. It's a fair deal, considering inflation is going to hurt you more than me.
I'll compromise, Bob. I'll take a bit less, but I think 45% is a fair share considering the inflation is eating into my potential earnings.
